forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny with gusty winds. High 9C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. Becoming windy late. High 47F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear and windy. Low near 0C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 32F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies with gusty winds. High 8C. Winds E at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with a few clouds from time to time. High 44F. Winds E at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy during the evening. Showers developing after midnight. Low 2C. Winds ESE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers late. Low near 35F. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High around 45F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 41F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 51F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 45F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low 37F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
